overview_of_class: This course will focus on modern topics in physical organic chemistry, while emphasizing the relationship between structure and reactivity.  Topics to be covered are molecular orbital theory, orbital symmetry and reactivity, stereoelectronic effects,  transition state theory, electron transfer, free energy relationships, nucleophilic and electrophilic reactivity, kinetic isotope effects, and basic photochemistry.
name: Physical Organic Chemistry
subject: CHEM
